channel.title: Newplayer outfit , how can i change that?
channel.description:
ok.. if someone log on in to my server he's wear nothing.. i'm wanna change that.. how can i change it? Help me please :eek:
G-Yiffa[br][br][size=1]: December 11, 2007, 06:42:28 AM[/size][hr]Someone? :eek:[br][br][size=1]: December 11, 2007, 06:48:49 AM[/size][hr]Come on people.. !!

item.title: Newplayer outfit , how can i change that?

@Paintball199 wrote:

i’m wanna change that… how can i change it?
Help me please :eek:

G-Yiffa[br][br][size=1]: December 11, 2007, 06:42:28 AM[/size][hr]Someone? :eek:[br][br][size=1]: December 11, 2007, 06:48:49 AM[/size][hr]Come on people… !![/quote]
If you dont know how to do this, Then i think your TupacScape’s Fail.

item.source: Newplayer outfit , how can i change that?

item.title: Newplayer outfit , how can i change that?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“mydr3am, post:2, topic:164065”]Dont tripple post.

Find: playerEquipment
in Player.java
change the numbers to the id you want, also like PlayerCape is the cape bla bla…

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1050; playerEquipment[playerCape]=2412; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3387; playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4131; playerEquipment[playerHands]=1059; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=4131; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1545[/quote]

dude… TY SO MUCH =)
rep++ for helping me also !
i’ve been waiting so long for this !

Read full topic

item.description:
@mydr3am wrote:

Dont tripple post.

Find: playerEquipment
in Player.java
change the numbers to the id you want, also like PlayerCape is the cape bla bla…

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1050; playerEquipment[playerCape]=2412; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=1704; playerEquipment[playerChest]=3387; playerEquipment[playerShield]=2890; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=4131; playerEquipment[playerHands]=1059; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=4131; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1545
